title: mondaysRmurder EP 9: The Tube Sock Murders
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: The murderer is always the one you'd never guess so I think Crystal did it!
the socks around the neck of ruth and diane are the killers signature. it is such a distinctive signature as well.
So the two murders are not related even though the women had matching tube socks tied around their neck? Cmon
the dog was killed, but little crystal was spared. the killings are linked. crystal could not ID the killer at 2 years of age, that is why he spared her.
